  • Volunteer Work

    -Volunteered at the Agastya International Foundation in rural India to teach hands-on engineering to middle school students

    -City of Chapel Hill Youth council member in 10th grade; communications officer and president of sustainability committee

    -Taught math at Phillips middle school Math Club every Friday to students who are preparing for math competitions for two years

    -Started Eco Club and founded Trash Terminators 1.0 and 2.0 teams at Phillips middle school to divert school waste from trash

    -Presented findings from school trash diversion program to CHCCS Sustainability director, Chapel Hill City mayor and council members, and State Senator Kinnaird

    -Created educational infomercial on composting that was aired on local TV

    -Volunteered to give a presentation at UNC Climate Leadership and Energy Awareness program (LEAP)

    -Helped at Chapel Hill festifall, hogday, and other events where I help teach people how to sort their trash into recyclables and compostables

This website was created by Rohan Deshpande from scratch. The website was made with over 1,500 lines of HTML code and 18,900 of CSS code!
